Package org.aposin.licensescout.license

Class ArtifactServerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aposin.licensescout.license.ArtifactServerUtil
  • public class ArtifactServerUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods related to accessing a server that is caching Maven central.

    The instance of this class checks if the server is reachable under the configured URL.

      • addLicensesFromPom

        public boolean addLicensesFromPom​(InputStream inputStream,
                                  Archive archive,
                                  String filePath,
                                  LicenseStoreData licenseStoreData)
        Adds licenses to an archive from information found in a Maven POM file.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input source of the POM file
        archive - the archive to add the licenses to
        filePath - path of the POM file (for information only)
        licenseStoreData - the license data object
        Returns:
        true if one or more licenses have been added, false otherwise
